attacks.name: Double Scratch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Dig Under
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance. (Any other effects that would happen after applying Weakness and Resistance still happen.)
